_sText:
This map starts as where the CTs spawn in the main part of the map to guard the bomb site to prevent the Ts from bombing it. The Ts spawn in underground tunnels in the map and must take one of the 4 tunnels into the map to get to the bomb site in the middle room of the map.


Somewhere in the map is a hidden room with 2 of every weapon (excluding knife and c4). If u can find this place, you will have any weapon you want.
